results.title: Be You No One Is More Qualified Distressed & Antiqued Primitive Sign
results.description:
Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask questions or make special requests. This sign measures approximately 12 inches by 5.5 inches. Sign shown is in Black/Antique White. Be You no one is more qualified


Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied first. Then the saying is applied to the sign, with a fine hairline used on all of the lettering which gives an awesome touch. After those steps are completed the sign is cleaned and goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed, giving it the final touches. It will have a hanger attached on the back.

We have used one font on this sign,  but used  all upper case on the top and all lower case on the second line to give it an unique touch. There are various color choices to choose from but if you don't see what you are looking for, please let us know and we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the base color, while the second color is the top coat.

Please let us know what color you want in the note section when ordering

COLOR CHOICES INCLUDE
Black/Antique White
Black/Country Tan
Barn Red/Antique White
Barn Red/Country Tan
Burgundy/Antique White
Burgundy/Country Tan
Brown/Antique White
Brown/Light Pink
Brown/Hot Pink
Brown/Sunflower
Brown/Sky Blue
Purple/Antique White
Hunter Green/Antique White
JohnDeere Green/Sunflower
Blue/Antique White

Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same. When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood available at the lumber yard, there are going to be some knots and other slight imperfections but that adds to the character of the sign as well as the antiquing process.

Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.. Shipment is generally 7 to 10 days. If you need this for a gift and want to know if if can be shipped quicker, please ask and we will make every effort prioritize

results.title: Skeet Yeet Repeat Vinyl Decal Sticker - Live Laugh Love but better
results.description:
The call to adventure is quiet at first. It creeps up on you. It comes as a whisper from a poem, a novel, or a movie that moved you in a profound way. It comes as a slant of light through a cracked window. It comes as a waft of petrichor in a thirsty desert.

It comes as a wolf howling on an otherwise silent night. It comes as a longing for a would-be lover’s as-of-yet unfamiliar, and yet somehow achingly familiar, touch. It comes as a glance in a mirror where you can, paraphrasing Jonathan Safran Foer, “feel your bones straining under the weight of all the lives you’re not living.”

Most of us hear the call in some subtle way. Few of us listen. Even fewer act upon it. Life is all too often a blazingly bright beacon blanketed and smothered by too much comfort, security, and safety.

It’s there, just under the surface, burning its achingly beautiful truth, waiting for us to lift the veil. Quietly challenging our spirit. Beckoning us to take a leap of courage.

Skeet.

Yeet.

Repeat.

~

This sticker is made of adhesive vinyl and will hold up both indoors and outdoors. Easily applied to walls, doors, glass, mirrors, laptops, cell phones, table tops, tablets, tumblers, vehicles and more!

If you would like an alternate color please message us before ordering and we will let you know if the color you want is in stock. Any color in the dropdown ships next day!

----- What's Included -----
+ (1) Vinyl Decal made from High Quality Adhesive Vinyl with Application Tape
+ Application Instructions

----- Product Information -----
+ Easily applied to any clean smooth surface
+ Measurements are to the longest side of the decal
+ 3-5 year outdoor durability on all vinyl decals, direct sunlight may cause fade over time

----- More Information -----
* Have a logo or design? Contact us for decals!
* Free free to contact us with custom orders or requests!

results.title: Live Well, Laugh Often, Love Much Wall Decal, Live Laugh Love Wall Decor Quotes, Family and Entryway Quotes
results.description:
Live Well, Laugh Often, Love Much

INSTRUCTIONS: 

Our custom wall decals require specific information to process your order. All orders will remain on hold until we receive your information. After receiving your information we will take two business days to process your order.

1. Complete checkout via Paypal.

2. In the comments box / notes section in Paypal please give us the following custom information: 

       - Requested "LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE" Color

       - Requested "Live Well, Laugh Often, Love Much" Color

Please pick from the following colors at checkout: 
Black, White, Light Gray, Dark Gray, Cream, Light Beige, Mocha, Brown, Red, Cranberry, Hot Pink, Bubble Gum, Coral, Orange, Copper, Yellow, Green, Dark Green, Olive, Lime, Teal, Mint, Blue, Navy Blue, Sky Blue, Purple, Light Purple, Silver, Gold

Sweetums Signatures is a small, family-owned, business in Ohio built on core values of hard work and delivering on our promises. Our goal is to deliver high-quality products (decals, apparel, engravings and more!) to help you personalize your home, your business, and your wardrobe at an affordable price. All our products are made to order, but our shipping speed is second to none! We strive to treat every client like a neighbor with the customer service you deserve.

Because of the custom nature of our products, custom orders and orders over $100.00 are not eligible for return/exchange unless the requested return is due to an error on our behalf. We encourage ordering a sample or smaller quantity first to be sure this will work for your intended project. Please be sure to review all of our shop policies and feel free to reach out to us with any questions you may have.

results.title: Motivational Print,Inspirational Poster,Motivation Print, Live Life print, Print of Encouragement,Dorm ,Heart of Home Print
results.description:
Live,Laugh,Love ....
Too many of my family and friends have lost their lives to Cancer. 

My motto is to live in the now and experience all I can. Not get caught up in the ins and outs of life but live for the moment and enjoy. 

10% of the proceeds of  all prints Sold, will go to Cancer Research.

These words and similar words inspired my friends and family members to fight cancer so in their honour I painted up these inspirational words to help us remember to Live, Laugh and Love.

A beautiful bright, vibrant and cheerful print for your home. A great print for the heart of your home. I have mine in my Kitchen.

Offered here are high quality inkjet prints on Professional Epson Archival Matte, 190g Brilliant white, from the Original watercolour painting. Prints are available in A4. It will be sent in a hard backed envelope Royal Mail first class.

Thanks for looking, please come again,
Mary-Anne :)

results.title: Boyfriend Girlfriend Name Charms. 5 letters. Mini Disc. Custom, Personalize, Monogram, Love, Initials, Party Favor. Mother's & Father's Day
results.description:
This listing is for just one disc. Order more, one for everyone you know!

One Antiqued Mini Disc
1/2" in diameter
7mm jewelry jump ring attached

ONE word, date or name
Up to 5 characters straight across - font size will limit how many characters will fit


DURING CHECKOUT:
1.) What color metal: copper, silver or gold?
2.) What is the word or date?
3.) What font size do you want?


Photo Font examples:
"wyatt" 1/16th inch Lowercase Gothic
"PIA" 1/16th inch Uppercase Arial
"norah" lowercase Typewriter font
"K♥L" 1/16th inch Uppercase Arial + Elongated heart
"J♥R" 1/16" uppercase Arial font + Classic heart
"S" 1/8th inch Fancy Uppercase initials


CHARACTER LIMITS BY FONT SIZE:
1/16" fonts = up to 5 letters across
1/8" fonts* = up to 3 letters across 
1/4" fonts = 1 letter only

*1/8" lowercase Cursive allows for only 2 letters across

If your name is LONGER than 5 characters, please use this other listing (you can order without the heart if desired):
https://www.etsy.com/listing/121222565/childrens-name-charms-curved-with-heart


Link to all the heart symbols:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/176246270/all-hearts


To add a CHAIN to your order, select them from this section of my shop:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TipsyWhimsey?section_id=22774411

To ADD items to your cart, just click on "keep shopping" from the cart and you can add more items. 
Fun! You can change the QTY once an item is in your cart.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


THE CHARM:
° This listing is for one set of initials, a monogram, one short word, one short name or one date on your charm.
° You can fit up to 5 characters across with 1/16th inch font size. A space or period counts as a character. Two lines are allowed.
° You can fit up to 3 characters across with 1/8th inch font size. A space or period counts as a character. One line is allowed.
° Jewelry jump ring will match the color of the charm. It is only suitable for jewelry, let me know if you need it for your keychain or pet collar.

THE WORD:
° Check out all the examples in the photos. You'll be able to figure out which font size you like best (depending on word length).
° You can use one name, a date, initials, add a heart between letters. I welcome your creative ideas, but please request similar to what you see in the photos.
° You can mix up font sizes, just be really specific during checkout so I can stamp it like you want.


HAND-STAMPING & ANTIQUING:
° Each charm is hand-stamped and antiqued by me. The letters won't line up perfectly, and each one will be thoroughly unique (like you!). The metals are antiqued along with the stamped letters, each charm will vary in darkness, marks, etc.
* Please note: if you only order numbers they will not look like "lowercase" letters; Numbers fonts are 1/16" Arial, 1/8" Block or 1/8" Typewriter.


FOR MONOGRAMS:
Letter on the LEFT (small font):
Letter in the MIDDLE (biggest font):
Letter on the RIGHT (small font):

LEFT: first name initial
MIDDLE: last name initial
RIGHT: middle name initial



NOTES:
More quantities can be custom ordered. If you are adding this to your own keychain, let me know, so I can use a stronger jump ring.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ locate the listing in my "charms" section.
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water.
...............................................................................................................

★FOR STAMPING ON THE BACK OF A CHARM:
★★★INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PAY FOR ADDITIONAL STAMPING FEES:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/

results.title: Live Laugh Love Sand Carved Mason Jar (etched)
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Sand Carved Mason Jar (etched)

Can be personalized for $8.00 (for sale in my etsy store)

Great for any country home.



-Made of dishwasher-safe glass
-Customizable
-Design is permanently sand etched into glass
-Due to the crafted nature and rustic design, each piece will be unique and will contain variations in glassware
 
Each glass is sand blasted. Photosensitive masks of each design are created and hand applied to the surface of each glass in the preparation for Wulf Creek Designs to then sand blast them...one-by-one. High pressure sand is sprayed through a nozzle to slowly etch away the surface.The sand blasting process creates amazing detail in glass and a deep cut design which you cannot get with laser etching. It will not fade or wash off making it dishwasher safe and requires no maintenance to preserve the etching - it's permanent!
 
How to Order-
-Choose Glass Type
-Choose Quanity
-Add Personalization  In Notes If Desired
-Check Out

If you need this in a hurry, I do have a Rush My Order Shipping upgrade that can be found in my  Etsy Store.
Some items like signs and cabinets may be excluded from this. If it is a larger item please message me before purchasing Rush Upgrade. Thank you.

results.title: Wine Label Live Laugh Love Style for Anniversary - Love Theme - Milestone wedding - Bridal or Couples Shower gift
results.description:
Live laugh and love on this special day, and every day!

These labels make beautiful Milestone wedding/shower gifts. They also make extra special Anniversary gifts!

You can also choose your own custom text (see image four).

Pick your two colors from the color chart (image three) or choose the colors that are shown.

--------- ABOUT OUR LABELS ---------

Each label is PERSONALIZED just for you. Our wine labels are a great way to add a unique touch of personalization to any celebration or event.

Our labels are made of high quality WEATHERPROOF semi-gloss polyester paper meaning that you can chill your wine/champagne bottles or you can put your wine/champagne bottles on ice without any worries of damaging the label!

All of our labels are PROFESSIONALLY PRINTED locally in Denver. 

--------- WHAT YOU WILL GET ---------

Your selected number of personalized labels. Labels arrive pre-cut and ready to apply to your bottles. Each label has a self-adhesive backing – just peel and stick. 

Labels measure 4.75" high x 3.5" wide unless otherwise stated. (This is a great fit for standard 750ml wine bottles).

Professionally printed instructions for removing original wine labels and applying your new labels are included with each order.

*NOTE: Wine and bottle not included. This listing is for the labels only.

TO ORDER
1. Leave the "Quantity" set to 1
2. Select your "Number of Labels"
3. Click "Add to Cart"

--------- WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU ---------

After you have added your item to your cart and have proceeded to checkout we will need some information from you in the "NOTE TO SELLER" section.

In "NOTE TO SELLER" kindly provide the following information: (you can copy & paste this section)

1. First name of the Bride and Groom:
2. Wedding date - month and day:
3. What anniversaries you want on the labels: 
(Examples: I would like all four to say Happy 1st anniversary or I would like the labels to say happy 1st anniversary, 2nd, 3rd and 4th).
4. Your two colors from the color chart (image three) or colors that are shown: 
(one color section for colored feathers/flowers and one color section for the leaves)

Please double check that you have provided all the information needed  for your personalized labels and that all information is spelled correctly.

PROOF REQUEST 
Our  team double and triple check your order notes against the actual labels before they ship to be sure everything is correct.

If you would like to see a PDF proof before printing, include a note with your order in the "NOTE TO SELLER" section stating PROOF REQUEST (in all caps).

If you request a proof, please allow 1-2 business days for us to create your custom digital proof. Custom digital proofs will be sent to your email associated with your etsy account (unless another email is provided in your note). Once you approve your proof we will then send your order out within 2-4 business days.

--------- DIY PRINTABLE OPTION AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST ---------   

Message or Email me and I will create a custom order for you with a DIY PDF version just for you!

If you select the DIY PRINTABLE option, you will receive a PDF file containing 4 labels (which is formatted for printing on one sheet of 8.5 x 11 paper).  With the PDF version you DO NOT receive any printed materials only the electronic file which you will need to print.

DIY PDF version of this file cost $12.00

To print as labels, print on 8.5 x 11 full sheet labels and cut out. Matte white full sheet labels are readily available at office supply and copy stores.

--------- SHIPPING INFORMATION ---------

All items will ship within 2-4 business days following your order.  **We are closed weekends, so please take that into account when calculating turnaround time.

All orders are shipped from Denver, Colorado USA.

US SHIPPING
We ship your order using USPS First Class Ground (Typically 5-7 business days to your door from placing order). For US orders a tracking number will be sent upon shipment and details regarding your shipping date can be viewed on your "Purchases" page. 

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
International shipping is shipped using USPS First Class (Typically 7-10 business days to Canada, and 2-4 weeks for International Delivery)

PRIORITY SHIPPING
Our US Customers can UPGRADE shipping in their SHOPPING CART. International shipping upgrades are available upon request ( Typically 3-5 business days to your door from placing order).

All items will be delivered to you via the contact and shipping information provided on your Etsy account unless otherwise stated in buyer’s notes, or in a message prior to shipment. Once an order is mark shipped we cannot change the shipping address. We do not take responsibility for a package shipped to the incorrect address provided through Etsy. You may either repurchase the entire order, or wait for the package to be returned to our office. We can reship once you pay shipping costs again.

--------- PRODUCTION PROCESS ---------

DESIGN - We customize your labels within 1-2 business days of purchase. 

TURNAROUND - Standard orders will be professionally printed and shipped within 2-4 business days (if no proof is required). If you request a proof, please allow 1-2 business days for us to create your custom digital proof. Custom digital proofs will be sent to your email associated with your etsy account (unless another email is provided in your note). Once you approve your proof we will then send your order out within 2-4 business days. 

COLOR NOTE - The colors in person may vary slightly from what you see on your computer. Each computer screen is different.

Business Hours:
Mon - Fri: 10 am - 6pm MST
Sat, Sun, US Holidays: CLOSED

MORE INFORMATION

Assembly is required. Application and removal instructions are included with each order. We recommend removing existing labels before applying your custom labels. 

We have created a couple handy videos to help you be a label pro.  

“How to Remove the Original Wine Label”  
YOUTUBE VIDEO: https://youtu.be/pu15ErELz_E

“How to Apply a Custom Wine Label” 
YOUTUBE VIDEO: https://youtu.be/6BYfz1_553A

WHAT TYPE OF BOTTLE SHOULD I USE WITH MY CUSTOM LABELS?
When selecting your bottles for your custom labels, the shape is important! Straight body bottles with high shoulders are recommended for this size of wine label. You want to avoid wine and champagne bottles that have funny shapes or odd textures. To give you a better idea, most Cabernet and Sauvignon Blanc bottles will work, as well as champagne bottles similar to the shape of Veuve or Moet Chandon. You also want the body of your bottle to be taller than your custom labels, meaning your bottle should be at least a few inches taller than 4.75 inches.

results.title: Live, Laugh,Love Acrylic Table Place Names Personalised Calligraphy Favours
results.description:
'Live, Laugh, Love'
Hexagonal Clear Acrylic Place Name Settings

These contemporary and stylish engraved place 'cards' will add a very stylish finish to your table, whether for your Wedding or Civil Partnership, a special Birthday meal, or any other seated event.
They're also a great 'budget-stretcher' as they're perfect doubled as your guests' favours.

Details
Each name piece measures approx 63 x 55mm 
Engraved with Live, Laugh, Love text and your guest's name in clear 3mm thick acrylic
Shatterproof and long lasting, our settings are engraved rather than decorated with vinyl or paint.

How to Order
Select the font style you prefer
Purchase the number of pieces you require
Complete checkout, then send us an etsy message with details of the names you would like engraved
Please send the names in a list (one below the other) and check your spelling carefully as we will engrave each name exactly as it is sent.
Your order will be cut, engraved and dispatched within 10 working days of payment and personalisation details being received.

We do not have a limit on the number of letters in names, but may need to alter the font size or layout slightly to accommodate particularly long names.

We design, cut and engrave or print all of our products here in our South Wales studio. Please visit our etsy store to see our wide range of unique event stationery and table decor.

results.title: Happy words face mask, creative face mask, lady bug face mask, fabric face mask with filter, quotes face mask, friendship face mask, joy
results.description:
Fun mask celebrating friendship, joy, heart, live, laugh, laugh, etc.  100% cotton fabric face mask with soft stretch elastic ear pieces and open slit in back to hold a filter layer if desired (carbon, coffee filter, etc).  Adult size.  Black background with various sayings (friendship, live love laughter, togetherness, good vibes, you make my heart happy, joy accented by hearts, lady bugs, and flowers.  Made in a pet free smoke free home, elastic was purchased from local Ohio factory.  Filter not included.  Non medical grade.  The elastic is very soft and stretchy, almost like Terry cloth or towel.  Wash in gentle cold, tug pleats back into position, hang on a door knob to dry, iron if desired.

live laugh love / friendship / happy face mask / quotes face mask / ladybug

results.title: Live Love Laugh keyring in Irish Gaelic, inspirational quote keyring, irish quote keyring, gaelic quote keyring
results.description:
Hand stamped washer keyring

'Saol, Gra, Gaire means 'Live, Love, Laugh' in Irish Gaelic

Measures approx 32mm

This item is made from aluminium which is a lightweight metal but also strong and durable. Aluminium is hypoallergenic and will not tarnish or rust but will scratch over time and if worn against other metals.

All of my items are hand stamped which means that each letter is stamped individually into the metal using a hammer and is not machine engraved. Due to this each letter or design might not be completely aligned or level as it is stamped by eye which adds to the character of each piece and makes your item unique.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Travel Art Print | Studio Carrie Wall Art | 5x7 | Gift
results.description:
This print features vintage inspired travel words and illustrations, perfect for anyone who loves to travel. La vie est belle! 


❖ PRINT
Measures 5" wide by 7" tall
Printed on acid free 100% cotton rag paper with a natural texture, using archival inks. Colors on your monitor may vary slightly from actual color of print, but rest assured it will be beautiful. This listing does not include matte or frame. This is a reproduction of original artwork created by me.


❖ SHIPPING: Your print will be shipped in a protective cellophane sleeve and in a rigid mailer.


♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
